User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://crysgarage.studio/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and API endpoints
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /static/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /studio
Allow: /help
Allow: /billing

# Crawl delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
